评论概述: My go to crop for the holidays!
评论详情: Why I’m Loving It: Adorable Style: The square neck gives this crop top such a flattering, trendy vibe. It’s simple but makes a statement. Perfect Fit: I got it in white, and it fits like a dream! True to size, snug but stretchy, and super comfortable. Soft & Stretchy Fabric: The ribbed knit material is lightweight and breathable, but also cozy enough for cooler weather. It’s a wardrobe essential! When I Wear It: Everyday Casual: Pair it with high-waisted jeans or leggings for an effortlessly cute look. Dressed Up: Add a statement necklace or earrings, and it’s perfect for date nights or dinner with friends. Lounging: Honestly, it’s so comfy I’ve even worn it for a chill day at home. Why You’ll Want It Too: I’ve already convinced my friends to get this top, and they’re loving it too! Whether you need a basic, versatile piece for layering or a cute crop for a night out, this top checks all the boxes.  Pro Tip: The white color looks amazing, but it’s so good I’m tempted to grab more in different colors. You can’t go wrong—it’s an easy addition to any wardrobe!

I bought these shirts to work out in. They are a synthetic material like most yoga wear. I wear a tank or sports bra under them, so that I can wear this around the house while I am working (since I work at home). When I am ready to get some exercise, I can keep the long sleeves if it is chilly, or take it off and just have the tank top. As you can see in the photo, I have a black tank under the olive colored shirt. The tank which is also Artfish is great too. They hit me right at the hip which is perfect with high waisted leggings. I was looking for a low scoop that would show a bit of the tank for a layered look that I can mix and match. I bought lots of colors and I am going to go back and get a couple more that I didn't order. These wash and dry nicely too. They have plenty of stretch so they are good for those of us who are a bit busty, but I think they would be fine on smaller chests too. The olive is a different color than shown in the listing, it is less yellow. I actually like it much better than their photo. It looks more like my photo, although mine is a little dark. The other colors that I got (gray, white, blue, teal, pink and red) are closer to the listing. The teal is nicer in person... a bit darker and more blue, like my photo. And the pink is a little different than their photo too. They have a lot of good bright colors to choose from, but I'd like even more to choose from. Hey Artfish, how about some muted colors too, like dusky purple, sage green, and bluish gray!

I love love love this top!! It is so flattering and makes everything sit just right. However, you can see EVERYTHING. I will be returning the white and ordering a different color instead because I do like the quality and it is the exact shirt I've been looking for.
